name: Wigwam Coeden Quarter Socks - Unisex
description: Blisters can ruin your hike or backpacking trip. These socks have a knit-in liner that wicks moisture from your foot to prevent hot spots and blisters. Durable outer sock regulates temperature so your feet stay warm in the cold and cool in the heat.Outer sock is a nylon and merino blend.Moisture-wicking zoned liner is 100% Olefin.INgenius technology moves moisture away from your foot to keep them dry on the trail.Mesh panel at the instep increases breathability.Seamless toe closure is hotspot-free.
